sqlMap.select:
select fv.VALIDATION_ID, fv.VALIDATION_REGEX as FLD_VAL_VALIDATION_REGEX, fv.SECTION_NAME as FLD_VAL_SECTION_NAME, fv.SITE_NAME as FLD_VAL_SITE_NAME,
fd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID, fd.DEFAULT_LABEL as FLD_DEF_DEFAULT_LABEL, fd.ENTITY_ATTRIBUTES as FLD_DEF_ENTITY_ATTRIBUTES, fd.ENTITY_TYPE as FLD_DEF_ENTITY_TYPE, fd.FIELD_INFO as FLD_DEF_FIELD_INFO, fd.FIELD_NAME as FLD_DEF_FIELD_NAME, fd.FIELD_TYPE as FLD_DEF_FIELD_TYPE, fd.REFERENCE_TYPE as FLD_DEF_REFERENCE_TYPE, fd.SITE_NAME as FLD_DEF_SITE_NAME,
sfd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID as SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID, sfd.DEFAULT_LABEL as SECONDARY_DEFAULT_LABEL, sfd.ENTITY_ATTRIBUTES as SECONDARY_ENTITY_ATTRIBUTES, sfd.ENTITY_TYPE as SECONDARY_ENTITY_TYPE, sfd.FIELD_INFO as SECONDARY_FIELD_INFO, sfd.FIELD_NAME as SECONDARY_FIELD_NAME, sfd.FIELD_TYPE as SECONDARY_FIELD_TYPE, sfd.REFERENCE_TYPE as SECONDARY_REFERENCE_TYPE, sfd.SITE_NAME as SECONDARY_SITE_NAME,
fc.CONDITION_ID, fc.DEPENDENT_VALUE as FLD_CON_DEPENDENT_VALUE, fc.DEPENDENT_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID as FLD_CON_DEPENDENT_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID, fc.DEPENDENT_SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID as FLD_CON_DEPENDENT_SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID, fc.FIELD_REQUIRED_ID as FLD_CON_FIELD_REQUIRED_ID, fc.VALIDATION_ID as FLD_CON_VALIDATION_ID,
condFd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID as FLD_CON_DEP_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID, condFd.FIELD_NAME as FLD_CON_DEP_FIELD_NAME, secCondFd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID as FLD_CON_SEC_DEP_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID, secCondFd.FIELD_NAME as FLD_CON_SEC_DEP_FIELD_NAME
from FIELD_VALIDATION fv inner join FIELD_DEFINITION fd on fv.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = fd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID left outer join FIELD_DEFINITION sfd on fv.SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = sfd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID left outer join FIELD_CONDITION fc on fv.VALIDATION_ID = fc.VALIDATION_ID left outer join FIELD_DEFINITION condFd on fc.DEPENDENT_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = condFd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID left outer join FIELD_DEFINITION secCondFd on fc.DEPENDENT_SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = secCondFd.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID
where ((fv.SITE_NAME = #siteName#) or (fv.SITE_NAME is NULL)) and fv.SECTION_NAME = #sectionName# and fv.FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = #fieldDefinitionId#
and fv.SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = #secondaryFieldDefinitionId#
and fv.SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID is NULL
sqlMap.insert:
insert into FIELD_VALIDATION (VALIDATION_ID, VALIDATION_REGEX, SECTION_NAME, SITE_NAME, FIELD_DEFINITION_ID, SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID) values (#id#, #regex#, #sectionName#, #site.name#, #fieldDefinition.id#, #secondaryFieldDefinition.id#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS value
sqlMap.update: update FIELD_VALIDATION set VALIDATION_REGEX = #regex#, SECTION_NAME = #sectionName#, SITE_NAME = #site.name#, FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = #fieldDefinition.id#, SECONDARY_FIELD_DEFINITION_ID = #secondaryFieldDefinition.id# where VALIDATION_ID = #id#
